title: RP161: Improving farm practices in Mackay North Queensland

tasks.task: Joining the 161 project for crop management advice.
subtasks: Explaining the motivation behind joining the project.
Describing the positive experience working with Shane.
Discussing changes made in nitrogen levels.
Expressing satisfaction with the financial outcomes.
Reviewing the process of creating a nutrient program based on soil samples.
Highlighting the ease of following the nutrient management plan.
Emphasizing the reassurance provided by John's recommendations.

Mentioning the cost savings experienced from the new approach.
